hadith.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:'Amrah bint Jawn sought refuge.with Allah from the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) when she was brought to him (as a bride) He said: "You have sought refuge with Him in Whom refuge is sought." So he divorced her and told Usamah or Anas to give her, a gift of three garments of white flax
